subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jerome Dyson scored 23 points and No. 12 Connecticut rallied for a 76-67 victory over Hofstra on Tuesday night in the second round of the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off in Storrs, Conn.
snippet: Jerome Dyson scored 23 points and No. 12 Connecticut rallied for a 76-67 victory over Hofstra on Tuesday night in the second round of the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off in Storrs, Conn.
